Description:
At Ru’ya Bilingual School, we are dedicated to providing high-quality education in both Arabic and English. The school’s slogan is ‘Entertain to Educate’, therefore, we are looking for teachers who are fun, creative, and passionate about teaching to join our team. We are looking for PreKG teachers and primary English teachers to teach grades from 1 to 5. You will be part of a team-oriented environment that provides support and ongoing professional development.As a PreKG, your responsibilities will be to:provide a variety of learning experiences and materials.
create a creative environment that helps pre-k students learn and contribute to their development.
meet students' needs and develop their verbal and communication skills.
create sensory learning experiences that allow students to explore and learn.As an English teacher, your responsibilities will be to:create a safe and flexible classroom environment conducive to optimal student learning.
plan and prepare lesson plans that meet core objectives and principles and are in line with the curriculum goals.
deliver lessons using a variety of differentiated instructional techniques that are appropriate to the academic level and meet the diverse needs of students.
encourage the development of critical thinking skills.
help students to work independently and collaboratively in groups.
encourage student responsibility, cooperation, tolerance, and mutual respect in a manner consistent with the School’s policies and procedures.When working with us, you will receive the following benefits: Paid summer holidays 
Medical insurance 
Transportation allowance 
End of service package 
Monthly, quarterly and yearly rewards 
On-site nursery for newborns. 
First and second children get a 50% discount on tuition fees. Skills
Skills:
BSc/BA in English Language or English Literature; or a related subject
Previous experience as an English teacher or PreKG teacher
Knowledge of various teaching methods
Deep understanding of the American curriculum and English language requirements
Exceptional organizational and communication skills
Dedication to students and education
The ability to compile lesson plans efficiently.
The ability to execute lessons with meaning, in a fun, and engaging manner.
proficient in the use of technology and computer applications
up-to-date with the latest teaching techniques and topics in English instruction

Data.Company Industry: Preschool, Nursery, & Daycare; Primary, Prep, & Secondary School
